metadata.title: CVE-2019-7164 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: SQLAlchemy through 1.2.17 and 1.3.x through 1.3.0b2 allows SQL Injection via the order_by parameter.

notes.note: mdeslaur> since 1.0, sqlalchemy issues a warning when text() is omitted this fix for this issue turns the warning into an error since this change may break existing applications, it may not get fixed, marking priority as low

criterions.comment: sqlalchemy package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.18+ds1-2ubuntu1').
